ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: On the Day when heaven sways to and fro
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The day the sky will tremble,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (It shall come to pass) on the Day when the heaven will convulse in a great convulsion,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On the day when the heavens will swiftly fly
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: A day on which the heavens will shake with a visible shaking.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: On the Day when Tamur the heaven Mawr,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: On the day when the heaven shall move from side to side
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Upon the day when heaven spins dizzily
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: On the day when the heaven will heave with (awful) heaving,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: on the Day when the skies are convulsed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: On the Day whereon the heaven will shake with an awful shaking.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: On the day when the sky whirls violently,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: On the Day when the firmament will be in dreadful commotion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: On the Day when the heaven will shake with a dreadful shaking,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Upon the Day when the heaven spins dizzily
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On the Day when the heaven sways in agitation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:9] On the day (yawma is operated by la-wāqi‘un, ‘will assuredly take place’) when the heaven will heave with a great heaving, [when it will] move and spin,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (On the day when the heaven will heave) will rotate (with (awful) heaving) with its inhabitants on like the rotation of a millstone, and created beings will surge on each other because of the terror they see.
